body: Can any mods give me there skype please i've made an appeal 3 months ago and have never gotten a reply all i ask is to get unbanned if not i see.

title: Unban

replies.body: I dont think you are going to get unbanned.  diamondporkchop3 got banned for multiple infractions, and I believe you have around the same amount.  Also posting on the forums reducing chances to get unbanned.
replies.body_tagged: I dont think you are going to get unbanned.  diamondporkchop3 got banned for multiple infractions, and I believe you have around the same amount.  Also posting on the forums reducing chances to get unbanned.

replies.body: oh well :/ i will wait 3 more months i guess.
